TopicTitle: ["Problem"] Confetti Farrings dont make good confetti

Articles.Content:
I want to give this to the community so that people are aware of it.

Basicly, I wanted to make a plane that could drop "confetti" farrings all over KSC.

[https://plus.google.com/116777068492196494960/posts/UKc1WW9bxv4](https://plus.google.com/116777068492196494960/posts/UKc1WW9bxv4)

Your support problem is decidedly lacking in the questions arena. If you could more describe your question/issue, we might know what you're asking for and provide some sort of answer.

Cheers,

~Claw

> 
> Your support problem is decidedly lacking in the questions arena. If you could more describe your question/issue, we might know what you're asking for and provide some sort of answer.
> Cheers,
> 
> ~Claw

I dont need a fix, I just thought that I would post this onto the forums so that other people can see the problem. It is a half-bug, half-exploit, and I dont know where else to put it.

> 
> What is the problem?

It would be best if when opening a farring in the cargo bay, my plane does not explode.

Again, There is not problem to fix. I just wanted to let the community know about this.

Moving to gameplay questions.

If you make your fairing with as many short steps as possible you will have more panels when you stage, you can also edit nArcs to increase the number of panels.
